## Source: amazon-inspector (4f854d89f15c6f2c295e60f0637ee2cafb7c529411ccde7fd17a6f234d35c1a4)
The package sharp32 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (845f95e2b2a4fda74205b37d644e9bacf9b283166313aeb024297e19f24d3dcf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'sharp32' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
